data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Throw-in for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 4, Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bahia a goal kick.
Bahia to take a throw-in in Botafogo territory.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 5, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Ball safe as Botafogo is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a Botafogo throw-in in Bahia's half.
In the minute 9, Botafogo awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Botafogo.
Kanu (Botafogo) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Juninho Capixaba for Bahia gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 14, Goal kick for Botafogo at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
Botafogo have a goal kick.
Clayson is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 16, Clayson is back on his feet again.
Can Bahia capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Bahia have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
In the minute 18, Free kick in a good position for Bahia!
Corner awarded to Bahia.
Gilberto's header is off-target for Bahia.
In the minute 19, Ball goes out of play for a Botafogo goal kick.
Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ernando (Bahia) strikes at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos but his header is cleared.
In the minute 23, Bahia have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo in their own half.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Botafogo in their own half.
Throw-in for Botafogo in the half of Bahia.
Juninho Capixaba (Bahia) gets a yellow card.
In the minute 27, Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Botafogo's Victor Luis has been booked in Rio de Janeiro.
Bahia awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 28, Gilberto for the away team is judged to be offside.
Botafogo are pushing forward but Victor Luis's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Bahia at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
In the minute 30, Botafogo have been awarded a corner by Savio Pereira Sampaio.
Throw-in Bahia.
Throw-in for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 31, Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
Botafogo have a dangerous throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Rio de Janeiro.
In the minute 33, Free kick for Botafogo in the half of Bahia.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards the away team a throw-in.
Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 35, Can Botafogo get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Bahia's half?
Ball safe as Bahia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Bahia in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in Bahia.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Juninho Capixaba.
Savio Pereira Sampaio awards Bahia a goal kick.
In the minute 39, In Rio de Janeiro a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Bahia's Juninho Capixaba is back in action after a slight knock.
Can Bahia capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Botafogo's half?
In the minute 40, Botafogo awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Attention is being given to Bahiaâ€™s Gilberto and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Bahia in the half of Botafogo.
In the minute 41, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Bahia just outside Botafogo's area.
Goal! Gilberto gives Bahia a 0-1 lead.
That's a fine assist from Marco Antonio.
In the minute 45, Savio Pereira Sampaio signals a free kick to Botafogo.
The fourth official's board shows 2 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Bahia's Gilberto looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 45, Botafogo's Rafael Forster breaks free at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Bahia have a goal kick.
Free kick Bahia.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over at Estadio Olimpico Nilton Santos.
